data.title: Nice, Clean Shoppe in downtown Rogers, AR
data.text:
Stopped by shortly after they opened. Nice, clean and no IMPORT stuff. Mostly all handcrafted and unique items from local artisans. Wide variety. Great gift ideas. Decorating items also.
Owner is super nice gal and they don't "pester" you to death to make a sale. We have been back twice and she has different items in almost daily.
